## **Why Is It More Accurate Than Any Other Source?**

The polls had Hillary winning by a landslide in 2016. They were [infamously wrong](https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2016/11/09/why-2016-election-polls-missed-their-mark/). 

And you can see why they always will be at the moment. If you’re a US voter, are you going to tell a stranger on the street who you’re voting for? You barely tell your family.

Similarly, do you know a news source that will predict, without bias, the 2020 US Election? Everyone has a team.

So we use weight of money and crowd wisdom. Hundreds of millions of dollars exchanged creates the most accurate intel you’ll find.

- - -

## **But Americans Can’t Bet On It, Can They?**

That’s true. If you live in the US, Presidential Betting is banned. 

However, expat Americans living all over the world do bet on it with Betfair (and their local bookies). Plus there are a bunch of pro punters who bet on political markets too. We’ll leverage their independent predictions as the November election approaches.
